description.text: Sustainable tourism—aka ecotourism—is a thriving practice. It is a perfect opportunity for tourists to travel in an environmentally responsible way. Some of its benefits are sustainable economic development, promotion and preservation of natural and cultural heritage, and improving the quality of life of the host community. Sustainable tourism involves many aspects and is not limited only to outdoor activities in natural areas but also to urban and rural tourism while taking care of the environment.
Here are some ecotourism destinations and activities that will allow you to visit our wonderful country while being responsible for the environment.
